channel.title: Blanck Mass on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Blanck Mass on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, June 2015
item.description: To reboot this series, Album Digest June 2015 features five fantastic albums from Hot Chip, Jamie xx, Blanck Mass, Holly Herndon, and The Orb. I could pick loads more as I’ve listened to a lot of albums since February but I decided to focus on the more electronic material. This means that I have no excuses for not continuing next month with a rockier theme.
